name: Morning Glory Muffins
description: Stir your favourite fillings into these muffins. Try fresh or frozen fruit or berries, pumpkin seeds, millet, or raisins. The options are endless! Make a large batch of muffins and freeze them to have a “grab-and-go” breakfast ready for the whole week.
preparation: In a large bowl, whisk eggs, apple sauce, and oil. Add mix; whisk until well combined.
Divide batter into cavities of 2 lightly oiled Muffin Makers.

In 2 batches, microwave on high 2 1⁄2 min. Rest in pan 5 min; invert onto wire rack to cool. Or, bake in preheated 375° F oven for 15–18 min, or until toothpick comes out clean. Cool in pan 10 min; unmold.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1⁄2 plain 2% Greek yogurt and 1 cup chopped fruit.
